page.title: 10THE PRISON
page.content: THERE HAS BEEN A PRISON IN SHEPTON MALLET SINCE 1627.DURING ITS LIFETIME IT HAS HELD MEN,WOMEN AND CHILDREN AND FROM 1945-1966 IT WAS A MILITARY DETENTION CENTRE.SINCE WHEN IT HAS BEEN A CIVILIAN MALE PRISON.A 122 PEOPLE WORK IN THE PRISON OF WHICH 48 ARE PRISON OFFICERS.MY DAD WORKS AT THE PRISON HE IS A TRADES OFFICER AND BEING AN ELECTRICIAN.THERE HAS BEEN 1 ESCAPE DURING THE THREE AND A HALF YEARS MY DAD HAS BEEN THERE!THERE ARE TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY FIVE PRISONERS.DURING THE DAY THEY HAVE TO DO JOBS SUCH AS-TIDYING THE TOWN,WORKING IN THE PARK,HELPING PEOPLE IN THERE HOMES.THERE ARE VARIOUS RECREATIONS THEY CAN TAKE PART IN DURING THE EVENINGS AND WEEKENDS SUCH AS-WATCHING T.V,PLAYING TABLE TENNIS,POOL,AND DIFFERENT SPORTS,GYM AND HELPING THE COMMUNITY SERVICE.
